mapper.insert: insert into users (id, name, phone, sex, driving_type, birth, company, address, album, open_id, submit_time, level, score) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{album,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driving_type = #{drivingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, album = #{album,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, phone, sex, driving_type, birth, company, address, album, open_id, submit_time, level, score from users where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, name, phone, sex, driving_type, birth, company, address, album, open_id, submit_time, level, score from users
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
